uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

host_ip.description: The IP address of the host.

community.description: The community which the host is a part of.

trap_level.description: The Trap Level of the Host.

informs.description: Whether Informs are supposed to be sent instead of notifs. Must be set to true in order to set inform_retries and inform_timeout.

inform_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds between retries for inform.

inform_retries.description: Number of retries in case of inform.

use_oobm.description: Whether to use the OOBM port.
